notifications.title: School Reopening Update
notifications.content: Classes resume on August 1st, 2025. Please review the updated academic calendar and safety protocols.

notifications.title: New Online Learning Platform
notifications.content: We're excited to introduce our new LMS system. Training sessions for parents and students start July 15th.

notifications.title: Uniform Policy Reminder
notifications.content: Please ensure all students have the correct uniform items before the new academic year begins.

notifications.title: Bus Route Changes
notifications.content: Several bus routes have been optimized. Check the transportation page for updated schedules.

notifications.title: Summer Camp Registration
notifications.content: Limited spots available for our summer enrichment programs. Register by July 20th.

notifications.title: Health & Safety Protocols
notifications.content: Updated health guidelines for the upcoming academic year. All families must review and acknowledge.
